name: Tennis racket
description: A lightweight racket used in the game of tennis to hit the ball over the net.

name: Badminton racket
description: A lightweight racket used in the game of badminton to hit the shuttlecock over the net.

name: Squash racket
description: A small, lightweight racket used in the game of squash to hit the ball against the wall.

name: Racquetball racket
description: A small, lightweight racket used in the game of racquetball to hit the ball against the wall.
